full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
# Telecommunications Analyst 

## Request for Proposal - S4642226

### Overview

The Department of National Defense (DND) invites qualified suppliers under EN578-172870 to submit a proposal for Temporary Help Services. This requirement is specific to contractors providing Telecommunications Analyst services.

## Supplier Eligibility

Eligible suppliers have been identified through the Centralized Professional Services System (CPSS) and are categorized under Stream 5.3 - Telecommunications Analyst.

## Proposal Submission

 Invitation to submit a proposal has been extended to the following suppliers:

* 1019837 Ontario Inc.
* 9468269 Canada Corp.
* Beyond Technologies Consulting Inc.
* Cistel Technology Inc.
* Cloud Shift Inc.
* Dalian Enterprises and Coradix Technology Consulting, in Joint Venture
* LNW Consulting Inc
* Modis Canada Inc
* NATTIQ INC.
* Nortak Software Ltd.
* OLAV CONSULTING CORP., MOSHWA ABORIGINAL INFORMATION TECHNOLOGY CORPORATION, IN JOINT VENTURE
* Pricewaterhouse Coopers LLP
* Solana Networks INC.
* TECH4SOFT INC., Expertise Technology Consulting Inc., in joint venture
* Turtle Island Staffing Inc.

## Description of Requirement

DND has a requirement for Temporary Help Services, including a Telecommunications Analyst, to support operational needs. The resources required have a minimum security level of Secret.

## Tender Details

* GlCN: NCR
* NCR Management: OTR
* Notice ID: N/A
* Request ID: S4642226
* login requirements: Authorized
* Security status: Open Now - Closes on 2023-09-13T14:00:00zin confirm closure date

**Resources Arranged**
Department of National Defense is seeking a Telecommunications Analyst to provide technical support on a temporary basis. The successful service contractor will facilitate the processing of technological transactions through the resources required.

**Closing Date:**
September 13, 2023 - 2:00 PM (EDT)

**Location:**
National Capital Region (NCR)

**More details on the tender and the technical requirement** can be found at the provided web resource: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/8838/s4642226--rfp-%28english-version.pdf\](English version) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender
